title: 1 Bedroom Apartment Now Available - Lease Your New Home Today!
posting_body: ['Take a Video Tour Today', '> Check out the video walkthroughs of our community’s amenities and apartment homes!', 'If you are interested in an in-person tour, feel free to call or email us at any time.', 'Please use the link in this ad to view our video tours & options to contact us directly.', 'You will immediately notice the exceptional design and first-class finishes at The Legends of Columbia Heights Senior Apartments 55+ community.', 'The apartments are spacious; the amenities include an in-home washer and dryer and a private balcony or patio.', 'Plus, we are centrally located in Columbia Heights just off of University Avenue – just steps from Huset Park and John Murzyn Hall Senior Center, which features weekly activities including fitness classes, card games, planned outings, and more!', 'Community Amenities Include:', '- Landscaped Outdoor Seating Area', '- Private Patio or Balcony Space (select homes)', '- Community Library & Business Center', "- 9' Ceilings Throughout", '- Kitchen Breakfast Bar or Island', '- Pet-Friendly Community', '- Large Walk-In Closet(s)', '- 55+ Active Seniors Community!', 'We are a pet friendly community!', 'Dogs & cats welcome!', '*Comfortable living does not have to be high dollar.', 'The Legends of Columbia Heights is a 55 or better senior community and participates in an affordable housing program.', 'Household income & student status limitations apply: 1 Occupant: $49,320 | 2', 'Occupants: $56,340 | 3', 'Occupants: $63,360 | 4 Occupants: $70,380.', 'To maintain the integrity of the community; credit, rental & public record background checks are conducted on all applicants.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-4:30PM', 'Make the move today by giving our professional staff a call:', 'show contact info', 'Legends of Columbia Heights', '3700 Huset Parkway', 'Columbia Heights, MN, 55421', '<URL>', '*Some Restrictions May Apply.', '8SDCaaOFz2j']
